code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AccountDetails=()=>{const[account,setAccount]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchAccount=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/account');setAccount(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching account details:",error);}};fetchAccount();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Account Details"}),account?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Account Number:"})," ",account.number]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Balance:"})," $",account.balance]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Account Holder:"})," ",account.holder]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading account details..."})]});};export default AccountDetails;
